author: Odeinoichus
title: Amusement Park Add-On with a Pet.
review:
Set #30409 Emma’s Bumper Cars: LEGO Friends seems to be limiting the number of Polybags being offered of late. There are only a few sets released and one of them is this nice little pack from LEGO. We’ll discuss pros and cons of this fun little Polybag then cover overall thoughts.

Pros:

  • Mini-Doll and Animal included.
  • Decent Parts-per-piece ratio.
  • Fun pair of models to build using interesting build techniques.
  • Very nice colouring.

Cons:

  • No accessories for the characters included with this set.

Overall opinion

We’ve seen a bumper car before in LEGO. I discussed the Joker’s Bumper Car a few years ago, this build is relatively close to how that build went as far as making the bumpers on the sides of the car. The colouring is much different and a second, smaller bumper car is built for animals to ride. Emma has her pet cat with her to play with.

It’s nice to see two models in the set to play with, however it seems a bit dangerous for an animal to ride around in a bumper car. Still I’m highly impressed with this set and strongly recommend tracking it down.
